name: Meditations In Red 4
description:
This is one of ten, unique "Meditations In Red". Each piece features a mandala-like pattern being created, frame-by-frame - growing from nothing to a soothing, colorful design with a background of stars, and then subsiding again into black. 

It is part of a larger collection: "Meditations In Color", which has a total of 100 unique pieces, with variations in color, number of spokes, types of fill, and overall pattern.

Lose yourself in the flow.

https://kschoener.art
